name: Embark (ROSSCOGames)
description:
Game is in development. Changes will be made and features will be added. When you load into the game, press the pink X button to close the intrusive navigator window, it is a work in progress and doesn't serve any purpose.

There isn't much to do in the game so far, except for explore the many different stars and planets in the Milky Way. You can hold shift to use the warp drive, and ctrl to land flat on nearby planetary surfaces. Press Y to leave the ship's cockpit, and E to get back in. Q and E can tilt the ship to the left and right.

Lore:

Sol's days are numbered. Mankind, seeing the writing on the wall, has left en masse for greener pastures, seeking refuge amongst the major powers in the Milky Way: the Republic of Orion, the Cygnusian Empire, and the Alliance of Minor Systems. Little does the fledgling interstellar species know, that pledging allegiance to one faction over the other could prove deadly. There has long been tension between the Orions and the Cygnusians, boiling to the brink of total war. Will you fight for freedom with the liberating armies of the Republic of Orion? Will you fight for honor and glory under the totalitarian Cygnusian Empire? Or will you fight for profit in the corrupt, pacifistic Alliance of Minor Systems?
